title: Thief In Canada Tries To Make His Getaway In Red Canoe
teaser: In Nova Scotia a burglar tried to get away in a canoe. Cops watched from both sides of the harbor until the culprit paddled into a park and tried to run off into the woods. The stolen item: a sword.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
